content: Mummy ne fridge kyun band kiya? — Kyunki fridge bolta tha 'I'm cool', to mummy ne bola, cool rehne de!
Teacher: English mein bolo, 'I am late.' Student: 'I am late hai boss!'
Boss: Friday ko late mat aana! Employee: Friday subah socha tha, late entry pe no attendance milegi!
Pappu: Shaadi me ghode pe baitne ka scene tha? Gora: Nahi yaar, sirf photo stall sahi hua tha!
Dadi: Tum ladkiyon ko beta bahut aaram se ho jata hai. Beta: Dadi, WhatsApp check karne me hi toh practice ho jati hai!
Colleague: Break time pe kaam karne ka time hota hai? Dusra: Haan, WhatsApp groups saaf karne ke liye!
Principal: Attendance 100% honi chahiye! Student: Sir, memes forward karne me 100% active hu!
Papa TV ka remote dhoond rahe the, mummy boli: Fridge ka remote se call kar lo!
Pyaaz ka halwa banana tha, ghar me sab ro diye!
Bachha: God, meri life simple rakhna. God: Thik hai, calculator khol le!
Exam me likha: 'Answer in brief'. Maine likha: 'Yes'.
Friend: Tera breakup kyun hua? Dusra: Usne bola 'Tum funny ho' — par uska matlab serious nahi tha!
Boss: Tum har baar late kyun aate ho? Employee: Kyunki time pe aane ka pressure hota hai!
Mummy: Ye phone mein log itna chipak kyun jaate hain? Beta: Kyunki charger chord chhota hota hai!
Mummy ne bola: Subah jaldi uthna! Main bola: Haan mummy, sapne mein milte hain!
Gol gappe wale bhaiya ka attitude toh Ambani jaisa hota hai!
Hostel me 3 cheezein kaafi hain: Maggie, jugad, aur best friend ka bed!
Behen ka phone chhoo liya — ab toh lagta hai property se bhi naam katwa degi!
Maths ke paper me sirf number line banayi — teacher ne bola, emotions bhi express kar liye!
Girlfriend ne poocha: Mein moti lag rahi hu kya? — Ab breakup ka time aa gaya tha!
Papa: TV chalu kaise karte hain? Beta: Pehle remote dhoondo, fir mood banao!
Exam me likha: 'Define stress' — Maine likha: 'Ye paper hi toh hai!'
Subah uth ke lagta hai alarm se zyada mummy ka chillana effective hai!
Hostel ki chai: Paani me pyaar aur dust ka tadka!
Samosa mein aloo kam aur hawa zyada thi — lagta hai dieting version tha!
Friend: Bhai paisa chahiye. Main: Dil bhi chahiye, milta kya hai?
Bachpan mein toothpaste kha liya, mummy ne kaha: Ab mooh band hi rakho!
Usne bola 'space chahiye' — toh maine WiFi ka password badal diya!
Work from home mein sirf 'work' missing hai!
Teacher: Tum late kyun aaye? Student: Sir, neend se breakup hi nahi ho raha tha!
Phone gira nahi ho jaise dil toot gaya ho!
Mummy: Kapde dhul gaye? Beta: Haan, barish ne dhul diye!
Gaon ki bus mein seat mile na mile, bonding zaroor milti hai!
Exam me answer likhne gaya tha, poem ban ke aa gaya!
Mummy: Ye 500 ka suit kitne ka diya? Shopkeeper: Aapke liye sirf emotional value!
Friend: Party kab dega? Main: Jab EMI khatam ho jayegi!
Class bunk karne ka thrill alag hi level ka hota hai!
Dadi: Shaadi kab karega? Main: Dadi, pehle job milne do!
Kambal se bahar nikalna sabse bada struggle hota hai sardiyo me!
Usne bola: Tum badal gaye ho. Maine kaha: Arre AC on hai!
Bhai: Remote de! Behen: Password bolo!
Teacher: Tumne homework kyun nahi kiya? Student: Kyunki meri zindagi hi pending hai!
WiFi chala gaya — ab toh zindagi offline lagti hai!
Boss: Kaam kahan tak hua? Main: Sir, meeting chal rahi thi team ke saath... (team = YouTube)
Paneer butter masala me paneer dhoondhna Wheres Waldo jaisa feel deta hai!
Assignment toh copy paste hi hota hai, bas source alag hota hai!
Mummy kehti hai: Kha lo warna phone le lo!
Usne DP black kar di — matlab breakup confirmed!
Science paper me toh diagram se hi emotional support le liya!
Desi parents ka WiFi band karne ka style: Router ki line hi kaat do!
Bachpan me TV dekhte hue mummy aati thi aur kehti thi: Bas 5 minute aur — lekin wahi 5 minute kabhi khatam nahi hue!
Exam ka pehla sawaal hi aisa tha ki pen ne likhne se mana kar diya!
Desi mom: Light off kar ke so jao. Desi bachcha: Light off ho gayi, ab WhatsApp on!
Friend: Chal movie dekhne? Main: Bhai, meri salary abhi recharge plan se zyada nahi hai!
Manager: Late kyun aaye ho? Employee: Sir, neend ka traffic jam tha!
Usne bola: Tum aur main perfect couple hain! — tabhi network chala gaya!
Papa: Mobile zyada mat chalaya karo. Beta: Thik hai, WhatsApp chhod ke thoda Facebook chalu karta hoon!
Teacher: Answer sheet blank kyun hai? Student: Silent exam tha sir, answer bhi silent hai!
Garam chai aur rainy season = pure Bollywood vibes!
Class cancel hone ki khushi uss time aati thi jab already bunk kar rakha hota!
Dadi ka phone ringtone abhi bhi ‘Jai Mata Di’ hai, aur volume full!
Bhai ne kaha: Tera asli friend wahi hai jo bina maange Maggi me se ek chammach de de!
Monday morning ka struggle Olympic level ka hota hai!
GF: Mujhe kuch alag chahiye... BF: Lo, WiFi ka password badal diya!
Science ke paper me likha: 'Water is life' — aur khatam!
Phone charge ho raha ho ya nahi, fir bhi 4 baar check karte hain!
Mummy ne bola: Light off kar ke so jao. Maine kaha: Andhere me toh dreams bhi horror hote hain!
Desi ghar me remote ka permanent address: Takiyake neeche!
College attendance bhi crypto jaisi hoti hai — kabhi high, kabhi missing!
Mummy shopping pe jaati hai sirf ek cheez lene — aur le aati hai market ki sale report!
Teacher: Tumhe samajh aaya? Student: Samajh toh gaya, likh nahi paya!
Zoom call me sirf shirt pehn ke baaki pyjama — asli professional touch!
Biryani me aloo daal diya? Arre yaar, ye toh insult hai!
Bachpan me Papa ke phone pe Snake game khelna hi luxury tha!
Usne kaha: Mujhe time nahi milta. Main bola: Calendar kharid le!
Desi aunty: Beta kitne ka package mila? Beta: Aunty, shampoo ka ya job ka?
Exam me 'Explain Newton's Law' likhne ke bajaye maine likh diya 'Google it!'
College ki canteen mein chai ke sath gyaan bhi free milta hai!
Friendship test: Charger maangne pe agar diya nahi, to dosti khatam!
Mummy: Khaana kyu nahi khaya? Beta: Kyunki sabzi me pyaaz ka dard tha!
Usne kaha: Tum badal gaye ho! Maine kaha: Kyunki ab load nahi leta!
Desi train journey = chai, samosa, aur strangers se emotional bonding!
Class monitor banna matlab unpaid security guard banna!
Battery 20% aayi nahi ki lagta hai duniya khatam ho gayi!
Office ki sabse important skill: Alt+Tab speed!
Jab sab kaam khatam ho jaye, tab bhi mummy kahti hai — kuch kaam dhang se nahi karta!
Gol gappe me teekha mangwaya tha, ab aankhon se bhi pani aa raha hai!
Papa ka favourite word: Jab main tumhari umar ka tha...
Friend: Chal bhaag le! Main: Kya kar liya? Friend: Kuch nahi, bas mann kar raha hai!
Breakup ke baad toh WhatsApp DP bhi attitude wali ho jati hai!
Report card aate hi TV band ho jaata tha!
Office lunch me sabse tasty cheez hoti hai — doosre ka khana!
Mummy: Chai garam hai, sambhal ke! Main: Arre mummy, dil thanda hai!
Engineering ka matlab: 4 saal ka stress + 1 saal ka scope!
Auto correct ne zindagi ki sabse badi bewafai ki!
Raat ko sote waqt socha: Kal se diet start karunga... subah se hi bhool gaya!
Desi ghar me TV remote zyada nahi, pyaar zyada lutaya jata hai!
Papa ki daant sun ke lagta hai ki duniya me sirf unhi ki rule chalti hai!
Friendship ka asli test: Jab saath me paise na hon!
Usne bola: Tu meri zindagi me lighting hai! Main bola: Matlab bijli ka bill toh badh jayega!
